so how do we know these trees worked

gas as we could out of the Jungle the

probably would be a good thing to have

uh we talked about they told us why they

what their dreams were what their

being

most of the recruiting was being done

some of them were notes saying get out
some of them were toys some of them were

if there's a peace process this is

when they only could recognize
